newsitem.title: USA: CBOT March soybeans higher, stops hit at $7.35/bu.
newsitem.headline: CBOT March soybeans higher, stops hit at $7.35/bu.

text.p: CBOT March soybean futures rose further in late trade as speculative traders probed for buy stops and hit them at $7.35 per bushel, traders said.
"Stops were hit at $7.35 and locals were forced to cover shorts," said Ron Kucha of O'Connor and Co.
Traders said Rand Financials bid the market higher and touched stops. Rosenthal Collins was also a buyer and Lind-Waldock was said to be short-covering.
At 1252 CST, soybeans were 2-1/2 to 7-1/2 cents higher, with March up 7-1/4 at $7.37-1/4.
